alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 9:46AM EDT until April 13 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony. .The Wabash River at New Harmony will continue its slow fall. The river is forecast to fall below flood stage Thursday. For the Wabash River...including New Harmony...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 16.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Thursday morning and continue falling to 6.9 feet Wednesday, April 19th. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
